TopicTitle: How do you set up a joystick

Articles.Content:
I have an old Saitek X45, but no software.   Do I need to download something?

And how do you get the game to recognize it?

 

Thanks in advance.

Plug stick in before starting game. Go to settings->input (or is it controls?) You must set axes manually on the right-hand side of the screen; it will not auto-default to anything.

Or is this where it's not recognizing the device?

Under Input, when you click on one of the control movements none buttons like pitch up it brings up a panel that says press the button on the controller.  When I move the controller, like I've done to program other flight sims, nothing happens.  I am on windows.
I got it!  I fiddled with it a little, and have the joystick working and the keyboard, too.
